key.name: custom-icon-path
key.description: Path to custom icon file (PNG or SVG). Leave empty to use default icon.

key.name: custom-command
key.description: Command to execute when clicking the icon. Leave empty to open app grid.

key.name: icon-size
key.description: Size of the icon in pixels

key.name: margin-right
key.description: Right margin of the icon in pixels
